name: I Didn't Think I'd Get This Far
name_original: I Didn't Think I'd Get This Far
description:
This is a somewhat unfinished version of my game. All I really wanted to add was intro and victory animations to tell a story so instead I'll tell it here. You're a fantasy rogue who went into this dungeon in search of an item that could grant him nearly endless wealth, an ancient wand. You sneak through the dungeon and make it to the treasure unnoticed, but upon grabbing the wand it begins firing uncontrollably, alerting all the monsters. You now have to escape the dungeon without being killed by monsters, or magic.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move, mouse to look.

The rainbow spiral is a sheild that only protects from your own magic, didn't have time for the tutorial process lol
